description: Finds shared documents on Google Docs related to the target domain.
Finds files hosted on OneDrive related to the target domain.
Finds files hosted on Dropbox related to the target domain.
Finds files hosted on Box related to the target domain.
Finds repositories or projects on Azure DevOps related to the target domain.
Finds SharePoint sites related to the target domain.
Finds files hosted on DigitalOcean Spaces related to the target domain.
Finds Firebase databases related to the target domain.
Finds Artifactory repositories related to the target domain.
Finds subdomains excluding common ones like www, shop, etc.

query: site:{nome} inurl:api | site:*/rest | site:*/v1 | site:*/v2 | site:*/v3
description: Finds API endpoints exposed by the target domain.

query: site:{nome} ext:log | ext:txt | ext:conf | ext:cnf | ext:ini | ext:env | ext:sh | ext:bak | ext:backup | ext:swp | ext:old | ext:~ | ext:git | ext:svn | ext:htpasswd | ext:htaccess | ext:json
description: Finds sensitive files such as logs, configs, backups, etc.

query: inurl:conf | inurl:env | inurl:cgi | inurl:bin | inurl:etc | inurl:root | inurl:sql | inurl:backup | inurl:admin | inurl:php site:{nome}
description: Finds directories that may contain sensitive configurations or backups.

query: inurl:"error" | intitle:"exception" | intitle:"failure" | intitle:"server at" | inurl:exception | "database error" | "SQL syntax" | "undefined index" | "unhandled exception" | "stack trace" site:{nome}
description: Finds error messages exposed on web pages.

query: inurl:q= | inurl:s= | inurl:search= | inurl:query= | inurl:keyword= | inurl:lang= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with query parameters that may be vulnerable to injection attacks.

query: inurl:url= | inurl:return= | inurl:next= | inurl:redirect= | inurl:redir= | inurl:ret= | inurl:r2= | inurl:page= inurl:& inurl:http site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with redirect parameters that may be vulnerable to open redirects.

query: inurl:id= | inurl:pid= | inurl:category= | inurl:cat= | inurl:action= | inurl:sid= | inurl:dir= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with ID parameters that may be vulnerable to IDOR.

query: inurl:http | inurl:url= | inurl:path= | inurl:dest= | inurl:html= | inurl:data= | inurl:domain= | inurl:page= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with path parameters that may be vulnerable to path traversal.

query: inurl:cmd | inurl:exec= | inurl:query= | inurl:code= | inurl:do= | inurl:run= | inurl:read= | inurl:ping= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with command execution parameters that may be vulnerable to RCE.

query: inurl:include | inurl:dir | inurl:detail= | inurl:file= | inurl:folder= | inurl:inc= | inurl:locate= | inurl:doc= | inurl:conf= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with file inclusion parameters that may be vulnerable to LFI/RFI.
Finds file upload forms that may be vulnerable to malicious uploads.
Finds API documentation that may expose sensitive endpoints.

query: inurl:login | inurl:signin | intitle:login | intitle:signin | inurl:secure site:{nome}
description: Finds login pages that may be vulnerable to brute force or credential stuffing.

query: inurl:test | inurl:env | inurl:dev | inurl:staging | inurl:sandbox | inurl:debug | inurl:temp | inurl:internal | inurl:demo site:{nome}
description: Finds development or staging environments that may expose sensitive data.

query: site:{nome} ext:txt | ext:pdf | ext:xml | ext:xls | ext:xlsx | ext:ppt | ext:pptx | ext:doc | ext:docx
description: Finds sensitive documents such as PDFs, Excel sheets, Word files, etc.

query: inurl:email= | inurl:phone= | inurl:password= | inurl:secret= inurl:& site:{nome}
description: Finds URLs with sensitive parameters that may expose user data.
